```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Figure 1
biomass = fread(
  file.path(
    "C:/Users/semfr/Documents/Market-based measures paper/SEAMAPS/SEAMAPS/data/biomass_competing_demand.csv"
  ),
  sep = ",",
  header = T
)
biomass <-
  melt(biomass,
       id.vars = c("Year"),
       variable.name = "Industries")
biomass$Industries <- relevel(biomass$Industries, "Shipping")
biomass_plot <-
  ggplot(biomass, aes(
    x = Year,
    y = value,
    fill = Industries,
    width = .75
  )) +
  geom_bar(
    alpha = 0.9,
    position = "stack",
    stat = "identity",
    width = 0.2,
  ) +
  ggtitle("") +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("EJ") +
theme_hc() +
  theme(panel.spacing.x = unit(4, "mm")) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 67,
             color = "orange",
             size = 1) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(
    angle = 90,
    vjust = 0.5,
    hjust = 1
  )) +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "D") +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
print(biomass_plot)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Figure 2
TTW = fread(
    file.path(input_folder, "/emissions_TTW.csv"
  ),
  sep = ",",
  header = T
)
WTT = fread(
    file.path(input_folder, "/emissions_WTT.csv"
  ),
  sep = ",",
  header = T
)
Upstream = fread(
    file.path(input_folder, "/emissions_upstream.csv"
  ),
  sep = ",",
  header = T
)
TTW <- melt(TTW,  id.vars = c("Fuels"), variable.name = "year")
setnames(TTW, old = "value", new = "TTW (Pilot Fuel Contribution)")
WTT <- melt(WTT,  id.vars = c("Fuels"), variable.name = "year")
setnames(WTT, old = "value", new = "WTT (Pilot Fuel Contribution")
Upstream <-
  melt(Upstream,
       id.vars = c("Fuels"),
       variable.name = "year")
setnames(Upstream, old = "value", new = "Upstream (Main Fuel Contribution)")
Fuels_database <- merge(TTW, WTT, by = c("year", "Fuels"), all.x = TRUE)
Fuels_database <-
  merge(Fuels_database,
        Upstream,
        by = c("year", "Fuels"),
        all.x = TRUE)
Fuels_database <-
  melt(Fuels_database,
       id.vars = c("Fuels", "year"),
       variable.name = "Emission_Accounting")
Fuels_database$Emission_Accounting <-
  relevel(Fuels_database$Emission_Accounting,
          "Upstream (Main Fuel Contribution)")
Fuels_database_plot <-
  ggplot(Fuels_database,
         aes(
           x = Fuels,
           y = value,
           fill = Emission_Accounting,
           width = .75
         )) +
  geom_bar(
    alpha = 0.9,
    position = "stack",
    stat = "identity",
    width = 0.2,
  ) +
  ggtitle("") +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("tCO2eq/GJ") +
theme_bw()+
  facet_grid( ~ year) +
  theme(panel.spacing.x = unit(4, "mm")) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(
    angle = 90,
    vjust = 0.5,
    hjust = 1
  )) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "D") +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
print(Fuels_database_plot)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Figure 3
#filter for Medium Biomass Availability and Medium Competing Demand as this is our baseline scenario
Scenario_database <-
  Scenario_database %>% filter(Scenario == "MBMD_WTW_99")
Scenario_database <-
  Scenario_database %>% filter(
    fuels == "VLSFO/HFOsc" |
      fuels == "MDO" |
      fuels == "MGO" |
      fuels == "LNG" |
      fuels == "MeOH-grey" |
      fuels == "MeOH-ebio" |
      fuels == "MeOH-PS" |
      fuels == "MeOH-DAC" |
      fuels == "NH3-grey" |
      fuels == "NH3-blue" |
      fuels == "NH3-green" |
      fuels == "LBG"
  )
Scenario_database <- Scenario_database[, c(1, 2, 5)]
Scenario_database <-
  melt(Scenario_database,
       id.vars = c("Year", "fuels"),
       variable.name = "Carbon_Pricing_Scheme")
Scenario_database_plot <-
  ggplot(Scenario_database, aes(
    x = Year,
    y = value,
    fill = fuels,
    width = .75
  )) +
  geom_bar(
    alpha = 0.9,
    position = position_stack(reverse = TRUE),
    stat = "identity",
    width = 0.2,
  ) +
  ggtitle("") +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Fuel Mix in PJ") +
theme_bw()+
  facet_wrap( ~ Carbon_Pricing_Scheme) +
    #scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "V") +
  #scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE)+
  theme(panel.spacing.x = unit(4, "mm")) +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Fuels"))+
  theme(aspect.ratio=1/1.1)
print(Scenario_database_plot)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#filter for Medium Biomass Availability and Medium Competing Demand as this is our baseline scenario
Scenario_Emissions_database <-
  Scenario_Emissions_database %>% filter(Scenario == "MBMD_WTW_99")
Scenario_Emissions_database <-
  Scenario_Emissions_database %>% filter(emissions == "WTW")
Scenario_Emissions_database <- Scenario_Emissions_database[, c(1, 4)]
IPCC_narratives = fread(
  file.path(input_folder, "/IPCC_narratives.csv"),
  sep = ",",
  header = T
)
Scenario_Emissions_database <-
  melt(
    Scenario_Emissions_database,
    id.vars = c("Year"),
    variable.name = "Scenarios"
  )
IPCC_narratives <-
  melt(IPCC_narratives,
       id.vars = c("Year"),
       variable.name = "Scenarios")
Scenario_Emissions_database <-
  rbind(Scenario_Emissions_database, IPCC_narratives)
setDT(Scenario_Emissions_database)[, theory := ifelse(Scenarios ==  "1.5°C" |
                                                        Scenarios ==  "well below 2°C", FALSE, TRUE)]
Scenario_Emissions_database_plot <- ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(Scenario_Emissions_database, theory),
    aes(
      x = Year,
      y = value,
      col = Scenarios,
      linetype = "Carbon Pricing Scheme"
    )
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = filter(Scenario_Emissions_database,!theory),
    aes(
      x = Year,
      y = value,
      col = Scenarios,
      linetype = "IPCC Narratives"
    )
  ) +
 ggtitle("") +
  ylab("WTW Emissions in million [M] GtCO2eq") +
  xlab("") +
  scale_linetype_manual("Linetypes",
                        values = c(
                          "Carbon Pricing Scheme" = "solid",
                          "IPCC Narratives" = "dashed"
                        )) +
  guides(
    fill = guide_legend(keywidth = 1, keyheight = 1),
    linetype = guide_legend(keywidth = 3, keyheight = 1),
    colour = guide_legend(keywidth = 3, keyheight = 1)
  ) +
theme_hc() +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "V") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = unit_format(unit = "M", scale = 1e-6)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
print(Scenario_Emissions_database_plot)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
  scale_y_continuous(labels = unit_format(unit = "M", scale = 1e-6)) 
print(Scenario_Emissions_database_plot2)
```
